ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iscld.1 | |- X = U. J |
| 2 |  | #P_difid | |- ( X \ X ) = (/) |
| 3 |  | #P_0opn | |- ( J e. Top -> (/) e. J ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( J e. Top -> ( X \ X ) e. J ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ssid | |- X C_ X |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_jctil | |- ( J e. Top -> ( X C_ X /\ ( X \ X ) e. J ) ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_iscld | |- ( J e. Top -> ( X e. ( Clsd ` J ) <-> ( X C_ X /\ ( X \ X ) e. J ) ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_mpbird | |- ( J e. Top -> X e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) |
